scripts.deploy-files: mkdir -p deploy && cp package.json deploy/ && cp -r .next deploy/ && cp pnpm-lock.yaml deploy/
scripts.deploy-prepare: npm run deploy-clean && pnpm build && npm run deploy-files
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-prepare && npm run deploy-install && npm run deploy-compress
scripts.deploy-server: npm run deploy-decompress && cd deploy && pnpm install --prod && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js || pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
